profile.not-selected-hint: Create or import a profile to get started

disclaimer.title: Important Notice

content.p1: This application does not upload any data to a server. All data is stored locally in your browser only.
content.p2: Clearing browser data, using private/incognito mode, or switching devices may result in permanent data loss.
content.p3: Please make sure to regularly back up your data using the "$t(profile.export)" button in the top-right corner.
content.p4: The developer is not responsible for any data loss and cannot assist with data recovery.

disclaimer.checkbox: I have read and understood the above

profile-import.title: Import Profile
profile-import.select-file-hint: JSON file exported from this app
profile-import.conflict-message: A profile with this ID already exists. You can overwrite it or create a copy.

profile-delete.title: Delete Profile
profile-delete.content-confim: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} ?
